name: Golden bullet (CheeseBaron2)
description:
Your unique gun can fire a magic golden bullet which can pierce through your enemies! Sadly you only have one of those so each time you shoot you will need to pick it up again. So how much points can you earn before your inevitable death?

CONTROLS: WASD for movement, mouse for aiming and shooting, space or escape to pause/unpause.

This game was made for the GMTK game jam in about 3 hours and the theme was "only one".
